summary_md: Czechia, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita (20,445 USD per person) and an inflation rate (2.44%) of specified levels, with an unemployment rate (2.51%) and life expectancy (79.88 years) that reflect its economic and social environment. The country's internet user penetration (86.00%) and share of GDP from exports (69.24%) are also indicative of its digital and trade dynamics.
